participant_1.background:

i work for a small , family owned restaurant.
i have a girlfriend of 7 years.
i like to go on walks.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to finish drywall like my dad.
traveling and making friends is something i find delightful.
i once started a forest fire in california.
i am interested in producing music.
I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.

content.text: I am doing good, how about you?
I am doing well, thanks for asking.  What do you do for a living?
I currently do not work, but I am interested in learning how to finish drywall like my dad.  What do you do?
I work for a small family owned restaurant.  I have a girlfriend of 7 years, and we like to go on walks together.
That sounds really nice.  I love traveling and making friends.  I once started a forest fire in California.
Oh no, I hope no one got hurt.  What made you do that?
I was just playing with a lighter and some leaves, and it got away from me.  I am not proud of it, but I have learned from my mistake.
It is good that you learned from your mistake.  What are you interested in doing in the future?
I am interested in producing music, and I would love to be a stay at home dad.  I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.
That sounds like a wonderful plan.  I hope everything works out for you.
